citations.narrative:
On 09/29/2023 a parakeet (Melopsittacus undulatus, age unknown) in the walk-through aviary was found dead after a
member of the public accidentally stepped on it. On 08/22/2023, a member of the public reported a dead parakeet (ID as
yellow, age unknown) to an employee. There were no employees in the enclosure at the time the bird was reportedly
found dead by the member of the public. Regarding dead bird reported by the member of the public, the facility wrote in
the record: “Stepped on??” Small birds such as parakeets that interact with the public are at risk of injury. During public
exhibition any animal must be handled and supervised so there is minimal risk of harm to the animal to assure the safety
and wellbeing of the animals.
Correct from 10/10/2023 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
REBECCA NANNEY, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.131(c)(1)  Critical
   
Handling of animals. 
On 09/29/2023 a parakeet (Melopsittacus undulatus, age unknown) in the walk-through aviary was found dead after a 
member of the public accidentally stepped on it. On 08/22/2023, a member of the public reported a dead parakeet (ID as 
yellow, age unknown) to an employee. There were no employees in the enclosure at the time the bird was reportedly 
found dead by the member of the public. Regarding dead bird reported by the member of the public, the facility wrote in 
the record: “Stepped on??” Small birds such as parakeets that interact with the public are at risk of injury. During public 
exhibition any animal must be handled and supervised so there is minimal risk of harm to the animal to assure the safety 
and wellbeing of the animals.  
 
Correct from 10/10/2023 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
REBECCA NANNEY, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
